data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Canelones, Uruguay to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Canelones, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Canelones prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Canelones, Uruguay to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 37,948 believers in Canelones, Uruguay to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Las Piedras
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Las Piedras, Canelones, Uruguay.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Canelones, Uruguay not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Canelones.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Canelones with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

location.name: Canelones
location.cities_list: Las Piedras, Barros Blancos, Pando, Canelones, Delta del Tigre
location.cities_list_w_pop: Las Piedras (69,682), Barros Blancos (31,650), Pando (24,047), Canelones (19,698), Delta del Tigre (17,973)
